name: towerDefenseCppUnreal
description:
Tower Defense in Unreal Engine

Controls:
WASD - Camera Control
Left Click - Select, Build, Upgrade
Right Click - Cancel

Mouse wheel - Zoom
Tab - Toggle Character View
Click and Drag - Camera Control during Character view


Instructions:
1. Click Build, Select Tower and Build on applicable nodes
2. Click any Tower on the map to upgrade or sell
3. Survive up to 10 rounds
